document.heading: District Government Certificate of Good Standing Filing Requirement Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-241, the “District Government Certificate of Good Standing Filing Requirement Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-973. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 2, 2014, and Dec. 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 22, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-592 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-241 became effective on Mar. 13, 2015.
